snippet: Questions and answers on $500 billion in tax increases and across-the-board spending cuts scheduled to take effect after Jan. 1.
abstract: Questions and answers offer tutorial on the so-called 'fiscal cliff,' $500 billion in tax increases and across-the-board spending cuts scheduled to take effect after Jan 1, 2013, unless Pres Obama and Republicans reach an alternative deficit-reduction agreement.
lead_paragraph: Questions and answers on $500 billion in tax increases and across-the-board spending cuts scheduled to take effect after Jan. 1.

headline.main: Demystifying the Fiscal Impasse That Is Vexing Washington
headline.print_headline: Demystifying the Fiscal Impasse That Is Vexing Washington
